item.title: 习近平呼吁采取积极宏观政策保持中国发展势头
item.description: 习近平主席呼吁中国今年实施更加积极的宏观经济政策，以保持增长势头，因为世界第二大经济体可能面临美国新的关税。【原文：President Xi Jinping called for China to implement more proactive macroeconomic policies this year to maintain growth momentum as the world’s No. 2 economy could be facing new US tariffs.】

item.title: 肯尼亚将放弃 364 天票据，到期日集中在短期
item.description: 肯尼亚计划停止发行一年期国库券，转而发行较长期限的证券，以减少到期短期票据的数量。【原文：Kenya plans to halt the issuance of yearlong Treasury bills in favor of longer-dated securities to reduce the amount of maturing short-term paper.】

item.title: 任天堂借鉴索尼模式推出新 Switch
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，Takashi Mochizuki 将分析任天堂保守的 Switch 2 首次亮相的影响。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Takashi Mochizuki breaks down the implications of Nintendo’s conservative Switch 2 debut.】

item.title: 特朗普将启动国家紧急状态，大举征收关税
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的第一任总统任期颠覆了全球经济的管理规则，他改变了美国援引国家安全的时间和方式，采用了广泛的经济安全概念，将从加拿大铝到欧洲汽车等广泛的事物置于他的关税视线之内。这一次，他似乎准备在重启贸易战的同时，重新定义美国的国家紧急状态概念。【原文：Donald Trump’s first presidency upended the rules governing the global economy as he shifted when and how America invokes national security by embracing a broad concept of economic security that put a wide range of things from Canadian aluminum to European cars in the sights of his tariffs. This time he appears ready to redefine America’s concept of a national emergency as he reboots his trade wars.】

item.title: 印度 Zomato 公司利润受超高速送货拖累
item.description: Zomato Ltd. 上一季度的利润下降了 57%，原因是竞争加剧和业务投资增加导致其快速配送部门的亏损扩大。【原文：Zomato Ltd.’s profit dropped 57% last quarter, as losses in its rapid delivery unit widened due to increased competition and higher investments into the business.】

item.title: 哈真纳集团总裁称完成马哈拉银行收购只是 "时间问题
item.description: 马来西亚主权基金 Khazanah Nasional 董事总经理 Amirul Feisal Wan Zahir 表示，马来西亚最大的机场运营商马来西亚机场控股有限公司（Malaysia Airports Holdings Bhd.【原文：Malaysian sovereign fund Khazanah Nasional believes it’s a “matter of time” before the privatization of the country’s biggest airport operator Malaysia Airports Holdings Bhd. is completed after multiple delays, Managing Director Amirul Feisal Wan Zahir said.】

item.title: Memecoin 总裁重燃加密货币狂潮
item.description: 本周末，美国当选总统和第一夫人的 Memecoins 成为现实，唐纳德-特朗普的下一任期必将出现各种狂热的庆祝活动。【原文：Memecoins by a US president-elect and first lady became a reality this weekend with all the bombastic trappings that are bound to characterize Donald Trump's next term in office.】

item.title: 以色列与哈马斯维持停火，谢克尔变得更加坚挺
item.description: 由于加沙已开始与哈马斯停火，期权交易商对以色列货币的悲观情绪是三年来最低的。【原文：Options traders are the least pessimistic in three years on Israel’s currency now that a ceasefire with Hamas has begun in Gaza.】

item.title: 新兴股市在就职典礼日出现史上最大折价
item.description: 周一，新兴市场为唐纳德-特朗普的第二个任期做好了准备，股市在美国总统就职日创下有史以来最大的估值折扣，一些债券利差也创下就职日最昂贵的水平。【原文：Emerging markets on Monday braced for Donald Trump’s second term with stocks languishing at the biggest-ever valuation discount on record for a US presidential inauguration day, and some bond spreads at the most expensive for the occasion.】

item.title: 据说中国自动驾驶公司 Inceptio 将考虑在美国上市
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，中国重型卡车自动驾驶技术开发商 Inceptio Technology 正在探索最快于今年在美国进行首次公开募股。【原文：Inceptio Technology, a Chinese developer of self-driving technologies for heavy-duty trucks, is exploring an initial public offering in the US as soon as this year, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 印度 Greenko 创始人拟筹资 8 亿美元收购 Orix 股份
item.description: 印度领先的清洁能源生产商之一 Greenko Energy Holdings 的创始人正在举债购买该公司的股份。【原文：The founders of Greenko Energy Holdings, one of India’s leading clean energy producers, are raising debt to buy a stake in the company.】

item.title: 希尔德布兰德称，瑞士央行面临驯服法郎工具之间的取舍
item.description: 瑞士国家银行前行长菲利普-希尔德布兰德（Philipp Hildebrand）表示，瑞士国家银行官员将利用一切可用的工具来实现他们的目标，但目前还不清楚他们需要在多大程度上依赖降息。【原文：Swiss National Bank officials will use all available tools to achieve their aims but it’s not clear how far they will need to lean on interest-rate cuts, according to former President Philipp Hildebrand.】

item.title: 主要投资者辟谣，印度珠宝商股价反弹
item.description: 在 Motilal Oswal Asset Management Co. 否认社交媒体上与该公司投资有关的猜测后，Kalyan Jewellers India Ltd. 的股票周一反弹。【原文：Shares of Kalyan Jewellers India Ltd. rebounded on Monday after Motilal Oswal Asset Management Co. denied social media speculation linked to its investment in the firm.】

item.title: 摩根大通策略师认为本季美国利润将超越欧洲
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Profit growth at US firms is likely to beat that of their European peers by a wide margin this earnings season, JPMorgan Chase & Co. strategists predict.】

item.title: 希尔德布兰德称顽固的通货膨胀是全球经济的最大威胁
item.description: 瑞士前央行行长菲利普-希尔德布兰德（Philipp Hildebrand）说，明年世界经济面临的最大威胁是通货膨胀可能持续存在。【原文：The biggest threat to the world economy in the next year is the prospect that inflation turns out to be persistent, former Swiss central bank chief Philipp Hildebrand said.】

item.title: 前汇丰银行交易员因经纪商收费提醒而输掉 140 万欧元官司
item.description: 汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一名前交易员声称，在他揭发支付给经纪商的费用可能过高后，银行对他不利，但他在巴黎一家劳资争议法庭上败诉，索赔 140 万欧元（140 万美元）。【原文：A former HSBC Holdings Plc trader who alleged the bank turned against him after he blew the whistle about potentially exorbitant fees paid to brokerages lost his claim for €1.4 million ($1.4 million) at a Paris employment tribunal.】

item.title: 毕马威会计师事务所对 Entain 的审计受到英国会计监管机构的调查
item.description: 英国审计监管机构表示正在调查毕马威会计师事务所为英国博彩公司 Entain Plc 所做的账目。【原文：The UK auditing regulator said it was looking into KPMG LLP’s work on British gambling company Entain Plc’s accounts.】

item.title: 桑切斯赶走首席执行官后，西班牙电信领跌
item.description: 西班牙社会党政府出人意料地赶走了西班牙电信公司长期以来的执行董事长兼首席执行官，导致该公司股价暴跌。【原文：Telefonica SA’s shares slumped after Spain’s Socialist government surprised investors by pushing out the carrier’s long-standing executive chairman and chief executive officer.】

item.title: 投资者押注罗马尼亚将在五月大选后放松外汇管制
item.description: 共产主义垮台以来最大的政治危机使列伊的有管理浮动汇率面临压力，投资者押注罗马尼亚将放松对本国货币的控制。【原文：Investors are betting Romania will ease its grip over its currency after the biggest political crisis since the fall of communism brought the leu’s managed float under stress.】

item.title: 富达的雷德尔看好英国债务，押注英国央行更大幅度降息
item.description: 据富达国际（Fidelity International）称，1 月初英国市场的大跌为政府债券创造了价值，尤其是投资者对支持经济所需的降息定价过低。【原文：The selloff in UK markets at the start of January has created value in government bonds, especially with investors underpricing the interest-rate cuts needed to support the economy, according to Fidelity International.】

item.title: 加密货币有望从特朗普第二任期中获益
item.description: 我们都知道，特朗普新政府可能会比拜登政府对加密货币行业更加友好。我们也知道，该行业对白宫的变化普遍表示支持和热情。但接下来究竟会发生什么呢？对行业有利在实践中到底是什么样子的？在新一届政府的领导下，加密货币行业究竟希望看到怎样的法规变化？在本期节目中，我们将与【原文：We all know that the new Trump administration is likely to be more friendly to the crypto industry than the Biden administration was. And we know that the industry has generally been rather supportive and enthusiastic about the change at the White House. But what's actually coming next? What does being favorable to the industry really look like in practice? What does the crypto industry actually want to see in terms of changing regulations under a new administration? On this episode, we speak wi】

item.title: 这就是加密货币行业对特朗普的实际需求
item.description:
在实践中，对行业的支持是怎样的？【原文：

What does supporting the industry look like in practice?

】

item.title: 奇货可居：加密货币对特朗普的实际需求（播客）
item.description: 我们都知道，特朗普新政府可能会比拜登政府对加密货币行业更加友好。我们也知道，该行业对白宫的变化普遍表示支持和热情。但接下来究竟会发生什么呢？对行业有利在实践中到底是什么样子的？在新一届政府的领导下，加密货币行业究竟希望看到怎样的法规变化？在本期节目中，我们将与【原文：We all know that the new Trump administration is likely to be more friendly to the crypto industry than the Biden administration was. And we know that the industry has generally been rather supportive and enthusiastic about the change at the White House. But what’s actually coming next? What does being favorable to the industry really look like in practice? What does the crypto industry actually want to see in terms of changing regulations under a new administration? On this episode, we speak wi】

item.title: 制裁以来中国航线超级油轮运价翻番
item.description: 自美国对俄罗斯实施制裁以来，在通往中国的主要航线上租用一艘超级油轮的成本增加了一倍，这表明美国的制裁行动在多大程度上颠覆了全球航运市场。【原文：The cost to hire an oil supertanker on key routes to China has doubled since the US imposed sanctions on Russia, showing the extent to which the move has upended the global shipping market.】

item.title: 伦敦金属交易所首次批准香港为仓库所在地
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所（London Metal Exchange）首次批准将香港作为仓库所在地，以加强与中国大陆这个全球最大金属市场的联系。【原文：The London Metal Exchange has approved Hong Kong as a warehouse location for the first time as the bourse seeks a stronger link to mainland China — the world’s biggest metals market.】

item.title: 华平将加入收购同行的行列，向中东扩张
item.description: 全球私募股权投资公司华平投资公司（Warburg Pincus LLC）计划加强其在中东地区的业务，加入近年来在这一能源丰富地区设立的众多收购公司的行列。【原文：Global private equity firm Warburg Pincus LLC plans to boost its presence in the Middle East, joining a raft of buyout shops that have set up shop in the energy-rich region in recent years.】

item.title: 供需缺口持续存在，中国工业引领通货紧缩
item.description: 中国工业部门连续第二年出现通货紧缩，表明供需严重失衡，导致价格下跌，并加剧了贸易紧张局势。【原文：China’s industrial sector led the economy’s deflation for a second straight year, in a sign of deep imbalance between supply and demand that’s driving prices lower and inflaming trade tensions.】

item.title: 爱尔兰投资发展局警告：特朗普执政期间全球外国直接投资流将发生变化
item.description: 爱尔兰外来投资机构负责人表示，唐纳德-特朗普今天晚些时候就任美国总统后，全球外国直接投资的格局将发生变化。【原文：The global landscape for foreign direct investment will change once Donald Trump takes up the US presidency later today, according to the head of Ireland’s inward investment agency.】

item.title: 新世界辟谣正在进行整体债务重组谈判
item.description: 香港房地产公司新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：Hong Kong property firm New World Development Co. said that it hasn’t been in or started any talks on an overall debt restructuring, as distress deepens across more builders in Greater China.】

item.title: 西班牙任命因陀罗-投资者接替党内忠诚人士担任主席
item.description: 西班牙任命 Indra Sistemas SA 的主要投资者之一领导该国最大的国防公司，接替社会党忠实成员的职位。【原文：Spain named one of Indra Sistemas SA’s main investors to lead the country’s largest defense company, replacing a Socialist party loyalist in the role.】
